name: Two Opposites
description: Indulge yourself into the journey of two opposites separated by a mirror. Help them meet each other by solving the puzzles that come along their way.  Remember that they can only solve these puzzles together. Disclaimer: This journey won't be easy ;)  Made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1!  Note- Your progress will be saved if you decide to come back to the game later!
